name: Root Them Up!
description:
Defend your plant from enemies!

Collect water to upgrade your plant and survive to waves of foes and unlock mini plants that help you through the game.

Once you unlock all upgrades you can select one of two PERMANENT upgrades. But be careful! wou will loose all previous upgrades by doing so...

  • Controls:
  • Movement = W,A,S,D.
  • Shoot = Mouse Left click.
  • Aim = Mouse Movement
  • Open Upgrades Menu = E.
  • Plant "Mini plant"= Space.
